result.arabic_text: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
result.translation: 7. Weligayo kuma aanu maqal (arrin)kan oo kale diintii hore3. (Arrin)kani ma aha waxaan aheyn been abuur.
result.footnotes: 3. Waxay ugala jeedaan diintii dambe diinta Nasaarada ama diintii shirkiga oo ay Quraysh heysatay.
